translation.zh: -你要把爱心涂掉吗？ -对啊 看看我

translation.en: It does look like a lift.
translation.zh: 的确像是电梯

translation.en: Girls, come see.
translation.zh: 孩子们 快过来看吧

translation.en: Girls...
translation.zh: 孩子们…

translation.en: -Carrie, look! -Good job!
translation.zh: -凯芮 你看 -做得好

translation.en: Excuse me, I thought we were painting your room!
translation.zh: 不好意思 我以为我们是在 替你们的房间粉刷墙壁

translation.en: -We are. -This is recess.
translation.zh: -是啊 -现在是休息时间

translation.en: What is going on here?
translation.zh: 到底是怎么一回事？

translation.en: Bree, it was my choice.
translation.zh: 布莉 那是我的选择

translation.en: And I do realize that you guys have way more in common.
translation.zh: 我也知道你们比我有更多共同点

translation.en: -This is so wrong. -It's the truth.
translation.zh: -这样简直大错特错 -这是事实

translation.en: No, I'm talking about somebody stealing books in Chesapeake Shores.
translation.zh: 不 我是指有人在切萨皮克湾偷书

translation.en: What part of Lending Library
translation.zh: 到底有谁不懂

translation.en: -don't people understand? -Bree, I'm talking about David.
translation.zh: -“分享书屋”的概念？ -布莉 我在跟你讲大卫的事

translation.en: -I feel awful. -Yeah, me too. This sucks.
translation.zh: -我觉得很糟糕 -是啊 我也是 这样很讨厌

translation.en: Would you be uncomfortable if I hire him?
translation.zh: 如果我雇用他 你会不会不自在？

translation.en: Because I do need a chef.
translation.zh: 因为我真的需要一位厨师

translation.en: Uncomfortable?
translation.zh: 不自在？

translation.en: No. No.
translation.zh: 不会

translation.en: Good. Okay.
translation.zh: 很好 好吧

translation.en: But I just want to make sure we're on the same page.
translation.zh: 但我只想确认我们的想法一致

translation.en: You're not breaking up with him because of me?
translation.zh: 你不会为了我而和他分手

translation.en: Right. I'm not saying you should date him.
translation.zh: 没错 其他人都说你应该和他约会

translation.en: -Oh, well. -Sally is not happy.
translation.zh: -这个嘛 -莎莉非常不高兴

translation.en: I just quit.
translation.zh: 我刚才辞职了

translation.en: David, I can't hire you yet.
translation.zh: 大卫 我现在还没办法雇用你

translation.en: I know, but I'm miserable waiting tables,
translation.zh: 我知道 但是我受够了当服务生

translation.en: and I'm too excited to get started.
translation.zh: 而且我非常期待我的新工作

translation.en: -Hi, Bree. -Hi, David.
translation.zh: -嗨 布莉 -嗨 大卫

translation.en: So I'll pick up what I need, and I'll see you at the B&B?
translation.zh: 那么我去采买 然后在民宿见？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: -Yeah, thank you. -See you soon.
translation.zh: -好 谢谢你 -待会见

translation.en: Take a book, leave a book! People.
translation.zh: 拿一本书 然后要放一本书 各位！

translation.en: It's a pretty simple concept.
translation.zh: 这是非常简单的概念

translation.en: People and their stealing ways.
translation.zh: 各种人和各种偷窃方式

translation.en: It's okay if you want to date David. I see the way that you look at each other.
translation.zh: 你和大卫约会真的没关系 我看见你们看着彼此的眼神

translation.en: Okay, well I don't know that that's even--
translation.zh: 好吧 我不知道 这样…

translation.en: -You just... Let's just let it go. -Okay.
translation.zh: -你只要…过去的就算了 -好的

translation.en: Why do you suppose we never decided to live here?
translation.zh: 你觉得为什么我们 从没想过要住在这里？

translation.en: Because we were going to make it on our own.
translation.zh: 因为我们可以闯出自己的一片天

translation.en: Prove to our families how it's done.
translation.zh: 向我们的家人证明一切

translation.en: Married, build a career and have a family.
translation.zh: 结婚、成就一番事业 然后建立家庭

translation.en: We showed them.
translation.zh: 我们确实证明了一切

translation.en: Dad was convinced for a while.
translation.zh: 有段时间爸真的相信了

translation.en: What did he call us?
translation.zh: 对了 他怎么称呼我们？

translation.en: -A couple of world beaters. -Right.
translation.zh: -举世无双的金童玉女 -没错

translation.en: What is going on? You didn't stay over to take a walk down memory lane.
translation.zh: 到底怎么了？你留下过夜 不是只为了散散步和追忆往昔吧

translation.en: In a way.
translation.zh: 某方面是如此

translation.en: Sometimes, when I look at you,
translation.zh: 有时候 当我看着你

translation.en: I see the girl that I fell in love with at NYU.
translation.zh: 我看到当初在纽约大学 爱上的那个女孩

translation.en: And sometimes, I see the woman who had two beautiful babies.
translation.zh: 而有时候 我看到一位 拥有两个可爱宝宝的女人

translation.en: But I always see someone who's a great mother,
translation.zh: 但我总是看到一位伟大的母亲

translation.en: taking care of Carrie and Caitlyn while I haven't always been there.
translation.zh: 我不在的时候 照顾着凯芮和卡琳

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: It hasn't been easy,
translation.zh: 那段日子并不容易

translation.en: but it's been my pleasure.
translation.zh: 但这是我的荣幸

translation.en: It's been really great having my family around.
translation.zh: 身边有家庭的感觉非常好

translation.en: You know what...
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: I realize what kind of life you have here at Chesapeake Shores.
translation.zh: 我终于理解你在切萨皮克湾的生活

translation.en: This is where you and the girls should live.
translation.zh: 你和女儿们应该住在这里

translation.en: I'm giving up my petition for custody.
translation.zh: 我会放弃争取监护权

translation.en: I'd like to go back to our old arrangement if that's good.
translation.zh: 我希望回到最初的协议 不知道这样好不好？

translation.en: Yes?
translation.zh: 好啊

translation.en: Yes, Wes.
translation.zh: 当然好 卫斯

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: Wes, I promise that I will do everything I can to make it easy for the girls
translation.zh: 卫斯 我保证会尽全力 让女儿们往返这里和纽约的

translation.en: to go between here and New York.
translation.zh: 日子好过些

translation.en: That's why I stayed over, actually.
translation.zh: 其实这就是我留下来的原因

translation.en: There's no reason for me to live in Brooklyn anymore.
translation.zh: 我没理由再继续住在布鲁克林了

translation.en: And every reason for me to live here.
translation.zh: 而所有理由都显示我该住在这里

translation.en: -What? -Not here, here.
translation.zh: -什么？ -不是这里

translation.en: Up the coast a bit.
translation.zh: 在沿岸的北边

translation.en: The girls will love that.
translation.zh: 女儿们会非常高兴

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: The rowboat is finished.
translation.zh: 划船做完了

translation.en: Well, sort of.
translation.zh: 大概吧

translation.en: I think I might be overdoing physical therapy.
translation.zh: 我猜我的复健做过头了

translation.en: Yeah. You think?
translation.zh: 是啊 你以为呢？

translation.en: It looks like you're training for a triathlon.
translation.zh: 你看起来像在为了铁人三项做训练

translation.en: -Just trying to keep me moving forward. -What's that supposed to mean?
translation.zh: -我只是想维持动力 -那是什么意思？

translation.en: Are you going to re-up?
translation.zh: 你要再回去服兵役吗？

translation.en: Mom thinks you're done.
translation.zh: 妈以为你已经不做了

translation.en: I'm going back to med school.
translation.zh: 我想要回去念医学院

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: -No way! -Yeah, I'm re-applying to Johns Hopkins.
translation.zh: -不可能 -对 我重新申请约翰霍普金斯大学

translation.en: What made you rethink being a doc?
translation.zh: 什么事让你重新考虑要成为医生？

translation.en: Being a patient.
translation.zh: 成为病患吧

translation.en: Guess that makes sense.
translation.zh: 这样还挺合理的

translation.en: When we went out for college, I don't think any of us intended coming back here.
translation.zh: 以前我们去外地念大学时 大概没有人会想到要回来这里

translation.en: At least, not to live.
translation.zh: 至少不是回来这里住

translation.en: Yeah, I know this summer even got me thinking.
translation.zh: 没错 今年夏天让我想了很多

translation.en: There's a lot to reconsider.
translation.zh: 很多事情需要重新思考

translation.en: There's something I haven't told anyone.
translation.zh: 有件事我还没告诉任何人

translation.en: I don't think I can get married.
translation.zh: 我觉得自己没法结婚

translation.en: At least not anytime soon.
translation.zh: 至少不会在近期

translation.en: -Are you serious? What happened? -Nothing happened.
translation.zh: -你是说真的吗？怎么了？ -没发生什么事

translation.en: I'm scared.
translation.zh: 我只是很害怕

translation.en: I know that you don't hear me say that much, but...
translation.zh: 我知道你不常听我说“害怕”二字

translation.en: But when she drove away the other day,
translation.zh: 但那天她开车离开时

translation.en: I felt relieved.
translation.zh: 我却感觉松了一口气

translation.en: I don't think that's the feeling you're supposed to feel, right?
translation.zh: 我猜一般人不该有这种感觉 对吧？

translation.en: Probably not.
translation.zh: 应该不会这样

translation.en: I love her. I'm just, I'm not ready.
translation.zh: 我爱她 我只是…还没准备好

translation.en: I get it.
translation.zh: 我大概能理解

translation.en: Your life's a mess.
translation.zh: 你的人生一团乱

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Trace?
translation.zh: 崔斯？

translation.en: So what couldn't you tell me over the phone?
translation.zh: 什么事你不能打电话告诉我呢？

translation.en: Wes gave me a full custody.
translation.zh: 卫斯把单独监护权让给我了！

translation.en: I'm so happy for you.
translation.zh: 我真替你高兴

translation.en: It's so amazing, you have no idea. Thank you.
translation.zh: 真是太棒了 你完全无法体会 谢谢

translation.en: -Congratulations. -Trace?
translation.zh: -恭喜你 -崔斯

translation.en: Oh, Abby.
translation.zh: 艾比

translation.en: -Hey, there. -Leigh.
translation.zh: -嘿 你好吗？ -丽伊

translation.en: Sorry to interrupt. You're right.
translation.zh: 不好意思打扰了 你说得没错

translation.en: There is plenty of room for a console and sound booth.
translation.zh: 这里的空间很大 可以放操控台 弄成录音间

translation.en: This space, it's outrageous.
translation.zh: 这里的空间真是大到不行

translation.en: Leigh decided to surprise me. Again.
translation.zh: 丽伊决定给我惊喜 再一次

translation.en: I think she's just excited to get a jump on the album.
translation.zh: 我想她只是很兴奋 想要抢先发行专辑

translation.en: Is he complaining that I didn't call ahead?
translation.zh: 他是在抱怨我没有事先打电话吗？

translation.en: Get over it, Trace.
translation.zh: 算了吧 崔斯

translation.en: Shoot me for being excited.
translation.zh: 如果我过度兴奋 那就朝我开一枪吧

translation.en: You and I? We got some work to do.
translation.zh: 你跟我？我们有很多工作要做

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: I'm sure Trace is very excited.
translation.zh: 我相信崔斯非常兴奋

translation.en: Oh, yeah? Well, you wouldn't know it by looking at him.
translation.zh: 是吗？光看他的外表又看不出来

translation.en: You know, Abby found my old 52 Engelmann Spruce.
translation.zh: 艾比找到我的旧52英格曼云杉吉他

translation.en: It was in her closet since high school.
translation.zh: 那把吉他从高中时 就一直放在她的衣柜里

translation.en: I figured that it might inspire him to start playing music again.
translation.zh: 我想或许这样会让他重新开始玩音乐

translation.en: Oh, well, something sure did.
translation.zh: 是啊 一定有某些影响

translation.en: I have some things to get settled. So, Abby, I'll see you later.
translation.zh: 我还得整理一些东西 艾比 待会见

translation.en: I had no idea that she would be back so soon.
translation.zh: 我完全不晓得她会这么快就回来

translation.en: It's okay, I'm good.
translation.zh: 没关系 我没事

translation.en: You sure?
translation.zh: 你确定吗？

translation.en: Well, aren't you glad I flew up to Boston?
translation.zh: 你应该很高兴我飞来波士顿吧？

translation.en: We made the numbers work, you got to avoid your wife's fundraisers.
translation.zh: 我们总算搞定这些数字 而你也可以避开你老婆的募款餐会

translation.en: It's a win-win for everybody.
translation.zh: 对大家都是双赢的局面

translation.en: You'll stick around and tell that to Candice when she gets home?
translation.zh: 你要待在这里 等到坎蒂丝回家后再告诉她吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不了

translation.en: Actually, my daughter is having a family get together.
translation.zh: 事实上 我女儿要举办家庭聚会

translation.en: Jess opened her own Bed and Breakfast.
translation.zh: 洁西开了她自己的民宿

translation.en: She did it all by herself.
translation.zh: 所有事她都自己来

translation.en: Sounds like a lot of work.
translation.zh: 听起来是个浩大工程

translation.en: She takes after her father.
translation.zh: 她遗传到她的父亲

translation.en: Then I'll be sure to steer clear.
translation.zh: 那么我势必会小心避开

translation.en: Why is it you never walk on the sunny side of the street?
translation.zh: 你为什么从不走在太阳照到的街上？

translation.en: I can't take time off like you.
translation.zh: 我没办法像你一样抽空放轻松

translation.en: Actually, this summer is the first time I ever have.
translation.zh: 事实上 这个夏天是我这辈子的第一个假期

translation.en: Should've done it a long time ago.
translation.zh: 我早就该这么做了

translation.en: -Oh, hey. How are you doing? -Hi.
translation.zh: -嘿 你还好吗？ -嗨

translation.en: I'm looking for Bree.
translation.zh: 我在找布莉

translation.en: Wisconsin Brie?
translation.zh: 威斯康辛的布利乳酪吗？

translation.en: O'Brien, Bree.
translation.zh: 是欧布莱恩的布莉

translation.en: She lives next door in the cottage, just across the stream.
translation.zh: 她住在隔壁的房子 就在对面的河岸

translation.en: Okay, great.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Do you want me to show you?
translation.zh: 你要我带你过去吗？

translation.en: No, I'm sure I can find it.
translation.zh: 不用了 我应该找得到

translation.en: I'd like to surprise her so... Thanks, appreciate it.
translation.zh: 我想给她惊喜 所以谢谢你啦

translation.en: Bree.
translation.zh: 布莉

translation.en: -So this need to be julienned. -What does that mean?
translation.zh: -所以这些要切丝 -那是什么意思？

translation.en: -Take a knife and cut it-- -Wait, isn't this your audition?
translation.zh: -拿一把刀 然后切… -等一下 这不是你的面试吗？

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Too many cooks.
translation.zh: 这里有太多厨师了

translation.en: Okay. Well, there you go.
translation.zh: 好吧 那么这里就交给你了

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Kicked out of my own kitchen.
translation.zh: 我被赶出自己的厨房

translation.en: Hey, who's that over at Bree's?
translation.zh: 嘿 在跟布莉讲话的那个人是谁？

translation.en: Do you use those a lot?
translation.zh: 你常用这个东西吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 才没有

translation.en: That's Martin.
translation.zh: 那是马丁

translation.en: -Demming? -Who's Martin Demming?
translation.zh: -德明吗？ -谁是马丁德明？

translation.en: -Bree's ex-boyfriend. -Bree's ex-boyfriend.
translation.zh: -布莉的前男友 -布莉的前男友

translation.en: Does Bree know that he is coming?
translation.zh: 布莉知道他要来吗？

translation.en: No, he wanted to surprise her.
translation.zh: 不知道 他想要给她惊喜

translation.en: -What happened between them? -Martin cheated.
translation.zh: -他们之间怎么了？ -马丁背着她偷吃

translation.en: Shouldn't you be cooking?
translation.zh: 你不是应该去做菜吗？

translation.en: Bree should be sending him packing.
translation.zh: 布莉应该叫他打包走人

translation.en: He'd have to unpack first.
translation.zh: 那他也得先打开包包才行

translation.en: -What does that mean? -Martin left his bag by the front door.
translation.zh: -那是什么意思？ -马丁把他的行李留在前门

translation.en: Unless that's Leigh's.
translation.zh: 除非那是丽伊的行李

translation.en: -Leigh is staying here? -Oh.
translation.zh: 丽伊要待在这里？

translation.en: I forgot to tell you.
translation.zh: 我忘了告诉你

translation.en: Leigh is staying here.
translation.zh: 丽伊要待在这里

translation.en: You know what? It's fine.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？无所谓

translation.en: I get my girls, I can handle anything.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？无所谓 我有了女儿 我什么事都能处理

translation.en: Okay, good, because you might want to hold that thought.
translation.zh: 很好 因为你可能要记住这点

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: -Sure, I can wait. -Okay.
translation.zh: -当然 我可以等 -好的

translation.en: Wes?
translation.zh: 卫斯？

translation.en: My car conked out on 260.
translation.zh: 我的车在260处抛锚了

translation.en: Abby, hey.
translation.zh: 艾比 嘿

translation.en: I forgot something in my trunk.
translation.zh: 我忘了后车厢还有东西

translation.en: Leigh Corley, Wes Winters.
translation.zh: 这是丽伊寇利 这位是卫斯温特斯

translation.en: Leigh plays in Trace Riley's Band.
translation.zh: 丽伊在崔斯莱利的乐团演出

translation.en: Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: 很高兴认识你

translation.en: -Wes is Carrie and Caitlyn's dad. -Oh, nice meeting you.
translation.zh: -卫斯是凯芮和卡琳的父亲 -很高兴认识你

translation.en: I tried calling.
translation.zh: 我试着打给你

translation.en: Six times.
translation.zh: 六次

translation.en: You did. Sorry.
translation.zh: 没错 抱歉

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: So would you be okay if I stay here?
translation.zh: 如果我待在这里 你会介意吗？

translation.en: Just for one night? My car's going to be fixed tomorrow morning.
translation.zh: 只有一晚而已 我的车明早就会修好

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
translation.zh: 当然 没问题

translation.en: Sure. Jess is having a cookout. It'll be a nice treat for the girls.
translation.zh: 好 洁西要办野炊 女儿们应该会很喜欢

translation.en: Okay, I'm just going to pay the cab.
translation.zh: 好 我去付出租车钱

translation.en: After I left the venue, I got thinking.
translation.zh: 离开活动场地后 我一直在想

translation.en: It's probably none of my business but working with Trace,
translation.zh: 或许不关我的事 但是我和崔斯共事

translation.en: staying in Chesapeake Shores, I hope it's not weird for you.
translation.zh: 然后待在切萨皮克湾 希望你不会觉得这样很奇怪

translation.en: Weird? No. I'm... no.
translation.zh: 奇怪？不会 我…不会啦

translation.en: It'll be fun getting to know each other. We can trade stories about Trace.
translation.zh: 我们能多认识彼此 一定会很有趣 我们可以交换关于崔斯的故事

translation.en: Oh, it's so fun.
translation.zh: 一定会很有趣

translation.en: This isn't awkward, is it? Me staying here, I mean?
translation.zh: 这样不会很尴尬 对吧？ 我是说我待在这里？

translation.en: -Awkward? No. Not at all. -Great.
translation.zh: -尴尬？不会 一点也不会 -太好了

translation.en: Now it's awkward and weird.
translation.zh: 现在是尴尬又奇怪

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: I would've said nothing's more beautiful than this view.
translation.zh: 我会说没有一处比得上这里的景色

translation.en: I'm sorry if you don't want me to read those.
translation.zh: 如果你不希望我读这些 我很抱歉

translation.en: Bree, they're really good.
translation.zh: 布莉 你真的写得很好

translation.en: I mean, your use of imagery and wordplay.
translation.zh: 我是指你写的意象和文字游戏…

translation.en: -I didn't know-- -What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你来这里做什么？

translation.en: I came to say I'm sorry. Again.
translation.zh: 我来向你道歉 再一次

translation.en: And to ask for your forgiveness.
translation.zh: 并且请求你的原谅

translation.en: Again.
translation.zh: 再一次

translation.en: -I was always there for you. -Yes, you were.
translation.zh: -我一直支持你 -没错 你的确如此

translation.en: You were never there for me in return.
translation.zh: 但你却从未对我投以相同回报

translation.en: While your star kept rising and rising, you just--
translation.zh: 你的事业逐渐上升 而你只…

translation.en: I was selfish, I was preoccupied.
translation.zh: 我很自私 我过度专注 布莉…

translation.en: -Bree I-- -Okay, can you stop agreeing with me?

translation.en: Let me be angry at you, because I am
translation.zh: 让我对你生气 因为我…

translation.en: so angry at you.

translation.en: What is that cliché? Everything was perfect until you showed up.

translation.en: It's so typical of you, Martin.

translation.en: What did you think was going to happen, coming here?

translation.en: Did you think I was going to just forget that you have another girlfriend?

translation.en: I was that girlfriend, Martin.
translation.zh: 那时我就是你的女友 马丁

translation.en: I was the one waiting all those years for you to ask me to marry you.
translation.zh: 我就是那个陪伴你多年 等你向我求婚的女友

translation.en: Me!
translation.zh: 就是我

translation.en: Not her!

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: Jess is having a cookout.

translation.en: If you want to stay...

translation.en: I don't know, you can stay.

translation.en: Oh, I see where you're taking me.
translation.zh: 我知道你要带我去哪里了

translation.en: It's our special place where we had our first kiss.
translation.zh: 这是我们第一次接吻的秘密基地

translation.en: The old make out spot.

translation.en: Make out spot? Really?

translation.en: I seem to remember you being too scared to make the first move.

translation.en: -What? -Yes! You were practically shaking.
translation.zh: -什么？ -对啊 你根本就在发抖

translation.en: I did kiss you first that night.
translation.zh: 那晚是我主动亲你的

translation.en: Well, I'm not scared now.
translation.zh: 现在我已经不怕了

translation.en: I have a confession to make.
translation.zh: 我要招认一件事

translation.en: I used to come here without you.
translation.zh: 以前我经常一个人来这里

translation.en: That's your confession?
translation.zh: 这就是你的自白？

translation.en: I felt safe here, all tucked away.
translation.zh: 我在这里感到很安全 我可以躲得好好的

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: I'm going to make sure you feel safe again.

translation.en: I don't want you to worry about this situation with Leigh.

translation.en: -We're just-- -Hey.
translation.zh: -我们只是… -嘿

translation.en: This is our spot.
translation.zh: 这是专属我们的地方

translation.en: All right!
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Let's just get some food and go, yeah?

translation.en: Stick around. It could be fun.

translation.en: What? Shouldn't you try to stay off your leg?

translation.en: I don't know, Lindy Hop. But only one game of Twister.

translation.en: Lindy Hop?
translation.zh: 林迪舞？

translation.en: Hey, what do you think living together if we move to Baltimore?

translation.en: What do I think? That'd be trouble.
translation.zh: 我觉得怎么样？那会是天大的麻烦

translation.en: -Right? -Hey, guys!

translation.en: Wait up.
translation.zh: 等等我

translation.en: -You just get here? -Yeah, I had lots to do and less to see.

translation.en: -Yeah, I'll take that for you. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -我帮你拿进去吧 -谢谢你

translation.en: Oh, yes.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: -What you looking at? -I don't know.
translation.zh: -你在看什么？ -我也不知道

translation.en: My ex-husband, who wants to be my friend again,
translation.zh: 我的前夫想要再度成为我的朋友

translation.en: is talking to my ex-boyfriend who wants to be my something, again.
translation.zh: 他正在和我的前男友说话 而前男友想要再度成为我的“某人”

translation.en: And his ex-girlfriend is talking to Jess
translation.zh: 他的前女友正在和洁西说话

translation.en: whose ex-boyfriend wants to be Bree's new boyfriend
translation.zh: 她的前男友想要当布莉的新男友

translation.en: unless, of course, Bree's ex-boyfriend becomes her new old ex-boyfriend.
translation.zh: 只不过布莉的前男友 刚刚成为她的新旧前男友

translation.en: -What are we looking at? -We don't know.
translation.zh: -你们在看什么？ -我们也不知道

translation.en: Just go get some food, it's delicious.
translation.zh: 你去吃点东西吧 食物很好吃

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: Hang on, I can't hear you.

translation.en: I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 我等一下就回来

translation.en: What? Trace?
translation.zh: 什么？崔斯？

translation.en: Okay, slow down. What happened?

translation.en: Did you call an ambulance?

translation.en: I'm on my way.

translation.en: No, I'll meet you there.

translation.en: Leigh Corley. She's in Trace's band.

translation.en: -Is she Trace's girlfriend? -No! I am.
translation.zh: -她是崔斯的女友吗？ -才不是 我才是他的女友

translation.en: -What? Since when? -Connor.

translation.en: -These bacon and maple thingamajigs -They're a hit, right?

translation.en: -Yeah! -I know!

translation.en: Hey, I wanted to thank you for giving me a chance.

translation.en: In spite of what happened between us.

translation.en: I mean, was there even

translation.en: ever an "us"?

translation.en: Don't worry. It's...

translation.en: -Okay. -Yeah, we're good.
translation.zh: -好的 -对 没关系

translation.en: Okay, let's see what you got. Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 好 让我看看你们的厉害 天啊！

translation.en: -Guys, that's amazing! -Carrie and Caitlyn!
translation.zh: -孩子们 你们真厉害 -凯芮和卡琳

translation.en: -How did you get them to do this? -I didn't do anything.

translation.en: I think they were just so determined to show me.

translation.en: Look.

translation.en: You know, she sings and plays piano.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？她会弹钢琴又会唱歌

translation.en: Dude, you can be my best man.

translation.en: Stay in your truck.
translation.zh: 请待在车上

translation.en: I said stay in your truck!
translation.zh: 我说待在车上

translation.en: I need to get to the hospital.

translation.en: -License and registration. -Would you listen to me please--

translation.en: Sir, I'll have you on your way as soon as possible.
translation.zh: 先生 我会尽快让你上路

translation.en: Here.
translation.zh: 拿去

translation.en: He seems like a great guy.

translation.en: Maybe you two just weren't right for each other.

translation.en: Don't we all just want somebody who brings out our best qualities?

translation.en: Yeah, that's how I feel.

translation.en: This party is more like a funeral.

translation.en: But Leigh's about to change that.

translation.en: Sounds like the party's finally started.

translation.en: You're still hungry?

translation.en: I know, I'm starving. There's no leftovers.

translation.en: I got s'mores.

translation.en: This is probably a really bad time to bring this up,

translation.en: and I would never want to hurt you about what you're going through.

translation.en: Oh, God. No, Kevin.

translation.en: That IED will always be there

translation.en: in the middle of the road.

translation.en: But you know with time,

translation.en: you know you'll get better.

translation.en: You will, I promise.

translation.en: -I've been trying to shake it off. -I know.

translation.en: they're not going to be the same for any two of us, but...

translation.en: I'm just saying I get it, and I'm here if you want to talk.

translation.en: Anytime.

translation.en: Brat.

translation.en: And to you...

translation.en: For what you've done to who you've become, honey.

translation.en: All on your own.

translation.en: when the ship goes down, like it always does,

translation.en: and I can't help them.

translation.en: -It's remarkable. -Yes, and this is your piece.

translation.en: I like that.

translation.en: Yeah.

translation.en: Come here.

translation.en: -Thank you. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -谢谢你 -谢谢你

translation.en: And wanted in an outstanding warrant.

translation.en: Put your hands out the window!
translation.zh: 把双手放在窗户上

translation.en: What's this about?

translation.en: Open the door from the outside and step out of the truck.

translation.en: -What are you doing? -You have the right to remain silent.
translation.zh: -你在做什么？ -你有权保持缄默

translation.en: My father has been rushed to the hospital.

translation.en: You have the right to an attorney.
translation.zh: 你有权聘请律师

translation.en: Okay! Okay, all right?

translation.en: -You've never made this before? -No. Never eaten one, either.
translation.zh: -你从没这样做过吗？ -没有 我也从来没吃过

translation.en: And you call yourself a chef?

translation.en: I used to have these all the time as a kid around a campfire.

translation.en: Owensboro, Kentucky!

translation.en: Can we put a hose on, Connor?

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: -Might be a while. -Little bit of a spell?

translation.en: You can always live in the cottage.
translation.zh: 你可以住在小木屋啊

translation.en: -I live in the cottage. -You're not going back to Chicago?
translation.zh: -我也住在小木屋耶 -你不回芝加哥吗？

translation.en: Well, I guess now is as good a time as any to make my announcement.
translation.zh: 那么我想现在正是时候 让我宣布一件事

translation.en: Perhaps I should stand.
translation.zh: 或许我应该站起来

translation.en: Now we know why you direct drama.

translation.en: Good point.

translation.en: sidetracked.

translation.en: Bree, you've been waiting a very long time to hear this.

translation.en: -No. -Bree.

translation.en: -No. -Bree.
translation.zh: -不行 -布莉

translation.en: -Bree, please. -Don't, Martin.

translation.en: Martin, don't do this.
translation.zh: 马丁 别这么做

translation.en: The Stage Left Theater Company
translation.zh: 意犹未尽剧院

translation.en: would like you to be this season's playwright-in-residence.
translation.zh: 希望邀请你成为本季的常驻剧作家

translation.en: -That's good, right? -Congratulations!
translation.zh: -这样是不是很棒啊？ -恭喜你

translation.en: -That's great! -Cool.
translation.zh: -真是太棒了 -太棒了 -太好了 -非常好

translation.en: -Ladies and gentlemen-- -Bree, congratulations!
translation.zh: -各位先生女士 -布莉 恭喜你

translation.en: Congratulations!
translation.zh: 恭喜你

translation.en: -Are you serious? -Congratulations!
translation.zh: -这是真的吗？ -恭喜你！

translation.en: All right, quiet down!

translation.en: Well, don't be that quiet. I was just kidding.

translation.en: -Yeah, we thought so. -You?

translation.en: Call me.
translation.zh: 回电给我

translation.en: -So? -New?

translation.en: I have a B&B. It's almost open.
translation.zh: 我拥有一间民宿 快要开幕了

translation.en: -Hey, honey! -Hey.
translation.zh: -嘿 亲爱的 -嘿

translation.en: Dad, you're back!
translation.zh: 爸 你回来了

translation.en: -You want to tell her? -I got a job!
translation.zh: -你来告诉她吧？ -我有工作了

translation.en: She got a job!
translation.zh: 她有了新工作

translation.en: -What? -Playwright-in-residence. Yeah!

translation.en: -Oh, my gosh! Bree! -I know, I mean...

translation.en: Hey, guys. These past few days, I've been...

translation.en: Well, now that the summer is coming to an end,

translation.en: I'm sure that everybody's thinking about what's next.

translation.en: I just wanted to say that I am deeply grateful for this family.
translation.zh: 我只想说我非常感谢这个家庭

translation.en: And not just because we survive, but because we thrive.
translation.zh: 不只是因为我们活了下来 而是我们还茁壮成长

translation.en: Look at Gran, flying all the way to Ireland on her own at her age.

translation.en: -Yeah. -I miss her.
translation.zh: -没错 -我很想念她

translation.en: Kevin, Jess,
translation.zh: 凯文、洁西

translation.en: if things had gone horribly wrong for you,
translation.zh: 如果你们的事情没处理好的话

translation.en: you two might not be here.
translation.zh: 你们两个就不会在这里了

translation.en: To me it seems clearly obvious
translation.zh: 对我来说 事情再清楚不过了

translation.en: that there is no stopping either one of you.
translation.zh: 没有任何事能阻扰你们

translation.en: And I'm so thankful.
translation.zh: 为此我非常感恩

translation.en: Bree O'Brien.
translation.zh: 布莉欧布莱恩

translation.en: -Yeah. -Bree,
translation.zh: -没错 -布莉

translation.en: congratulations again on realizing one of your dreams.
translation.zh: 再次恭喜你实现你的梦想之一

translation.en: And whatever you decide to do, whether it's to stay here with us
translation.zh: 不论你决定怎么做 选择和我们一起待在这里

translation.en: or go, just know that we are always with you.
translation.zh: 或者选择离开 你只要记住我们会一直支持你

translation.en: Young man,
translation.zh: 年轻人

translation.en: you and I...
translation.zh: 你和我…

translation.en: You and I
translation.zh: 你和我

translation.en: have a very, very complex relationship.
translation.zh: 有着非常复杂的关系

translation.en: But I think the reason for that is that
translation.zh: 但我认为其中的原因是

translation.en: you are so much more like me than I ever realized.
translation.zh: 你比我以为的要更像我

translation.en: So...
translation.zh: 所以呢…

translation.en: good luck with that.
translation.zh: 祝你好运

translation.en: -Thanks. -And to my first born,
translation.zh: -谢啦 -对于我的长女

translation.en: to those who say that you're following in my footsteps,
translation.zh: 对于那些说你只是追随父亲脚步的人

translation.en: I say that you are walking a path that is entirely your own.
translation.zh: 我说你走出了完全属于自己的一条路

translation.en: And I'm so proud of you.
translation.zh: 而且我非常引以为傲

translation.en: I'm proud of all of you, guys.
translation.zh: 我为你们感到骄傲

translation.en: Your grandfather used to say,
translation.zh: 你们的祖父总是说

translation.en: "The reason we, Irish, fight so much
translation.zh: “我们爱尔兰人这么拼的原因

translation.en: is because we have no other worthy opponents."
translation.zh: 是因为实在没有可以匹敌的对手”

translation.en: So here's to that fighting spirit in all of us.
translation.zh: 所以敬我们内心的战斗精神

translation.en: Here is to meeting whatever rises up in front of us, head-on.
translation.zh: 敬未来将出现的任何挑战 尽管放马过来吧

translation.en: May you live as long as you want,
translation.zh: 祝你们的生活心想事成

translation.en: and never want as long as you live.
translation.zh: 并且在往后的日子心无挂碍

translation.en: To the O'Briens!
translation.zh: 祝欧布莱恩一家

translation.en: -To the O'Briens! -Cheers!
translation.zh: -祝欧布莱恩一家 -干杯

translation.en: -Cheers. -Cheers.
translation.zh: -干杯 -干杯
